name: Total Tank Simulator
summary: Commander in the ranks. Soldier at heart. Choose a faction and deploy and command your army into massive physics-driven WWII battles to the last man standing. Destroy everything on sight with an insane amount of units that will behave tactically.
info:
• 中文名: 全面坦克模拟器
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020年5月20日
